execution_quality: Agent provided no tool execution but engaged in conversational analysis. The user received sufficient value to continue with related implementation discussion.
work_category: Conceptual discussion and technical exploration of Yubikey PIN caching behavior and idle-time-based session management.
summary: This conversational task resulted in a clear alignment between agent and user on the approach to idle-time-based cache clearing. The user's enthusiastic response and immediate specification of additional related requirements indicate the agent's explanation met expectations precisely.
follow_up_pattern: User approved the concept and immediately expanded scope to include additional requirements (lid close, screen lock, TTL settings).
